snippet: The living green roof and new populations of insects, birds and bats are testament to the success of the eco-friendly renovation.
abstract: Editorial lauds eco-friendly renovation of Jacob K Javits Convention Center, which has attracted bird and bat species with its living green roof, bird protective glass and new population of insects; praises center as a model for a more sustainable New York City.
lead_paragraph: The living green roof and new populations of insects, birds and bats are testament to the success of the eco-friendly renovation.

headline.print_headline: More Life at the Javits Center
headline.main: More Life at the Javits Center

keywords.value: Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design (LEED)
